long_description: The Amphipod AirFlow MicroStretch Race Belt sports a comfortable, breathable and bounce-free design, and it carries all of your small essentials for training, races and trail runs. AirFlow(TM) hybrid mesh technology wicks away moisture and circulates air between your back and the pack. Fully adjustable stretch belt expands to 4 times its size. Internal divider in the zippered compartment is removable for added capacity. The Amphipod AirFlow MicroStretch Race Belt is fully adjustable for a comfortable fit.
short_description: The Amphipod AirFlow MicroStretch Race Belt sports a comfortable, breathable and bounce-free design, and it carries all of your small essentials for training, races and trail runs.
